mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cobbett's complete collection of state trials and proceedings for high treason and other crimes and misdemeanors from the earliest period [1163] to the present time [1820]
Complete collection of state trials
General index to the collection of state trials
Howell's state trials v. 3-34
State trials
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Mr. Cobbett appears, by the title page, as editor of the first ten volumes, but his name is said to have been the only thing he contributed."--Marvin, Legal bibl.; cf. also Dict. nat. biog.; Bridgman, Legal bibl. [original]
Vols. 11-21 have statement of responsibility: Compiled by T.B. Howell; vols. 22-33: Compiled by T.B. Howell and continued from the year 1783 to the present time by Thomas Jones Howell. [original]
Imprint varies: v. 10-31: Printed by T.C. Hansard for Longman [etc.]; v. 32-34: London : Longman [etc.]. [original]
Vol. 34: General index to the collection of state trials compiled by T.B. and T.J. Howell / by David Jardine. 1828. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Trials--Great Britain
